notesStmt.note: Contains the last lines of the preliminary prayer לעולם יהא אדם (Midrash Tana deṿe Eliyahu 22 as in ʹAmram Gaʾon and Solomon of Sujulmassa), and the beginning Pesuḳe de-zimrah, including the Blessing (starts האל המהולל, omitting the introductory paragraph ברוך שאמר, as in Saʹadia and Solomon of Sujulmassa), followed by the assembled Psalm excerpts יהי כבוד and Psalms CXLV-CXLVI; sporadic vocalization; The copyist may have been writing from memory, as he confuses verses CXLV 6 and 11, causing a line of homoeoteleuton which was immediately scratched.
